name: Adobe InDesign Lock File
summary: Learn about .INLK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: INLK files help prevent multiple users from editing the same file at the same time.

description: Document lock file created by Adobe InDesign, a professional page layout program; created when an InDesign document (.INDD file) is opened so that other instances of InDesign show warnings when trying to open or edit the document.
